verses.verse: The P'rushim <WG5330> also <WG2532> with the TZ'dukim <WG4523> came <WG4334> <WG5631>, and <WG2532> tempting <WG3985> <WG5723> desired <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846> that he would shew <WG1925> <WG5658> them <WG846> a sign <WG4592> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>.

<WG1161> He answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, When it is <WG1096> <WG5637> evening <WG3798>, ye say <WG3004> <WG5719>, It will be fair weather <WG2105>: for <WG1063> the sky <WG3772> is red <WG4449> <WG5719>.

And <WG2532> in the morning <WG4404>, It will be foul weather <WG5494> to day <WG4594>: for <WG1063> the sky <WG3772> is red <WG4449> <WG5719> and lowring <WG4768> <WG5723>. O ye hypocrites <WG5273>, ye can <WG1097> <WG5719> discern <WG1252> <WG5721> <WG3303> the face <WG4383> of the sky <WG3772>; but <WG1161> can ye <WG1410> <WG5736> not <WG3756> discern the signs <WG4592> of the times <WG2540>?

A wicked <WG4190> and <WG2532> adulterous <WG3428> generation <WG1074> seeketh after <WG1934> <WG5719> a sign <WG4592>; and <WG2532> there shall no <WG3756> sign <WG4592> be given <WG1325> <WG5701> unto it <WG846>, but <WG1508> the sign <WG4592> of the prophet <WG4396> Jonas <WG2495>. And <WG2532> he left <WG2641> <WG5631> them <WG846>, and departed <WG565> <WG5627>.
And <WG2532> when his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> were come <WG2064> <WG5631> to <WG1519> the other side <WG4008>, they had forgotten <WG1950> <WG5633> to take <WG2983> <WG5629> bread <WG740>.

Then <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Take heed <WG3708> <WG5720> and <WG2532> beware <WG4337> <WG5720> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of the P'rushim <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the TZ'dukim <WG4523>.
And <WG1161> they reasoned <WG1260> <WG5711> among <WG1722> themselves <WG1438>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, It is because <WG3754> we have taken <WG2983> <WG5627> no <WG3756> bread <WG740>.

Which when <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> perceived <WG1097> <WG5631>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, O ye of little faith <WG3640>, why <WG5101> reason ye <WG1260> <WG5736> among <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, because <WG3754> ye have brought <WG2983> <WG5627> no <WG3756> bread <WG740>?

Do ye <WG3539> not yet <WG3768> understand <WG3539> <WG5719>, neither <WG3761> remember <WG3421> <WG5719> the five <WG4002> loaves <WG740> of the five thousand <WG4000>, and <WG2532> how many <WG4214> baskets <WG2894> ye took up <WG2983> <WG5627>?
Neither <WG3761> the seven <WG2033> loaves <WG740> of the four thousand <WG5070>, and <WG2532> how many <WG4214> baskets <WG4711> ye took up <WG2983> <WG5627>?

How <WG4459> is it that <WG3754> ye do <WG3539> not <WG3756> understand <WG3539> <WG5719> that I spake <WG2036> <WG5627> it not <WG3756> to you <WG5213> concerning <WG4012> bread <WG740>, that ye should beware <WG4337> <WG5721> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of the P'rushim <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the TZ'dukim <WG4523>?

Then <WG5119> understood they <WG4920> <WG5656> how that <WG3754> he bade <WG2036> <WG5627> them not <WG3756> beware <WG4337> <WG5721> of <WG575> the leaven <WG2219> of bread <WG740>, but <WG235> of <WG575> the doctrine <WG1322> of the P'rushim <WG5330> and <WG2532> of the TZ'dukim <WG4523>.

When <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> came <WG2064> <WG5631> into <WG1519> the coasts <WG3313> of Caesarea <WG2542> Philippi <WG5376>, he asked <WG2065> <WG5707> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Whom <WG5101> do men <WG444> say <WG3004> <WG5719> that I <WG3165> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> am <WG1511> <WG5750>?

And <WG1161> they said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Some say that thou art <WG3303> Yochanan <WG2491> the Immerser <WG910>: <WG1161> some <WG243>, Eliyah <WG2243>; and <WG1161> others <WG2087>, Jeremias <WG2408>, or <WG2228> one <WG1520> of the prophets <WG4396>.
He saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, But <WG1161> whom <WG5101> say <WG3004> <WG5719> ye <WG5210> that I <WG3165> am <WG1511> <WG5750>?

And <WG1161> SHim`on <WG4613> Kefa <WG4074> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> the Moshiach <WG5547>, the Son <WG5207> of the living <WG2198> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Blessed <WG3107> art thou <WG1488> <WG5748>, SHim`on <WG4613> Barjona <WG920>: for <WG3754> flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> blood <WG129> hath <WG601> not <WG3756> revealed <WG601> <WG5656> it unto thee <WG4671>, but <WG235> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

And <WG1161> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> also <WG2504> unto thee <WG4671>, That <WG3754> thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> <WG5748> Kefa <WG4074>, and <WG2532> upon <WG1909> this <WG5026> rock <WG4073> I will build <WG3618> <WG5692> my <WG3450> Congregation <WG1577>; and <WG2532> the gates <WG4439> of SH'ol <WG86> shall <WG2729> not <WG3756> prevail against <WG2729> <WG5692> it <WG846>.

And <WG2532> I will give <WG1325> <WG5692> unto thee <WG4671> the keys <WG2807> of the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772>: and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> thou shalt bind <WG1210> <WG5661> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> bound <WG1210> <WG5772> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>: and <WG2532> whatsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> thou shalt loose <WG3089> <WG5661> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> loosed <WG3089> <WG5772> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>.

Then <WG5119> charged he <WG1291> <WG5668> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> that <WG2443> they should tell <WG2036> <WG5632> no man <WG3367> that <WG3754> he <WG846> was <WG2076> <WG5748> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> the Moshiach <WG5547>.

From <WG575> that time forth <WG5119> began <WG756> <WG5662> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> to shew <WG1166> <WG5721> unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, how that <WG3754> he <WG846> must <WG1163> <WG5748> go <WG565> <WG5629> unto <WG1519> Yerushalayim <WG2414>, and <WG2532> suffer <WG3958> <WG5629> many things <WG4183> of <WG575> the elders <WG4245> and <WG2532> chief Kohanim <WG749> and <WG2532> scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> be killed <WG615> <WG5683>, and <WG2532> be raised again <WG1453> <WG5683> the third <WG5154> day <WG2250>.

Then <WG2532> Kefa <WG4074> took <WG4355> <WG5642> him <WG846>, and began <WG756> <WG5662> to rebuke <WG2008> <WG5721> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Be it far <WG2436> from thee <WG4671>, YY <WG2962>: this <WG5124> shall <WG2071> not <WG3364> be <WG2071> <WG5704> unto thee <WG4671>.

But <WG1161> he turned <WG4762> <WG5651>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto Kefa <WG4074>, Get thee <WG5217> <WG5720> behind <WG3694> me <WG3450>, Satan <WG4567>: thou <WG1488> <WG5748> art <WG3754> an offence <WG4625> unto me <WG3450>: for thou savourest <WG5426> <WG5719> not <WG3756> the things <WG3588> that be of 'Elohim <WG2316>, but <WG235> those that be of men <WG444>.

Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> <WG5627> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, If any <WG1536> man will <WG2309> <WG5719> come <WG2064> <WG5629> after <WG3694> me <WG3450>, let him deny <WG533> <WG5663> himself <WG1438>, and <WG2532> take up <WG142> <WG5657> his <WG846> execution stake <WG4716>, and <WG2532> follow <WG190> <WG5720> me <WG3427>.

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will <WG2309> <WG5725> save <WG4982> <WG5658> his <WG846> life <WG5590> shall lose <WG622> <WG5692> it <WG846>: and <WG1161> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> will lose <WG622> <WG5661> his <WG846> life <WG5590> for <WG1752> my <WG1700> sake <WG1752> shall find <WG2147> <WG5692> it <WG846>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> is a man <WG444> profited <WG5623> <WG5743>, if <WG1437> he shall gain <WG2770> <WG5661> the whole <WG3650> world <WG2889>, and <WG1161> lose <WG2210> <WG5686> his own <WG846> soul <WG5590>? or <WG2228> what <WG5101> shall a man <WG444> give <WG1325> <WG5692> in exchange <WG465> for his <WG846> soul <WG5590>?

For <WG1063> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall <WG3195> <WG5719> come <WG2064> <WG5738> in <WG1722> the glory <WG1391> of his <WG846> Father <WG3962> with <WG3326> his <WG846> angels <WG32>; and <WG2532> then <WG5119> he shall reward <WG591> <WG5692> every man <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his <WG846> works <WG4234>.

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, There be <WG1526> <WG5748> some <WG5100> standing <WG2476> <WG5761> here <WG5602>, which <WG3748> shall <WG1089> not <WG3364> taste <WG1089> <WG5667> of death <WG2288>, till <WG302> <WG2193> they see <WG1492> <WG5632> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> coming <WG2064> <WG5740> in <WG1722> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932>.
